1.definition: to select for some purposeto conscript for military service

2 a.definition: a system for or act of selecting individuals from a group (as for military service)

sub_terms.b: the act or process of selecting an individual (as for political candidacy) without his or her expressed consent

3.definition: an order for the payment of money drawn by one person or bank on another see also,compare

documentary draft.definition: a draft that will be honored only upon the presentation of certain documents (as an invoice or certificate of title)

time draft.definition: a draft payable a specified number of days after the date of the draft or of its presentationvt

2.definition: to compose or prepare esp. the preliminary version of [legislation]to practice draftsmanship
